text: Alex Chandre de Oliveira or simply Tico (21 December 1977 – 14 June 2014) was a Brazilian football player who played as a striker. He played for Zhejiang Greentown between 2006 and 2007. He died of a heart attack at his home in Curitiba.ViAvaí - Por onde anda: Alex Chandre, o Tico! ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1977 births Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Brasiliense Futebol Clube players Category:Paraná Clube players Category:Chengdu Tiancheng F.C. players Category:Daejeon Hana Citizen FC players Category:Avaí FC players Category:Montedio Yamagata players Category:Esporte Clube Bahia players Category:Zhejiang Greentown F.C. players Category:Associação Desportiva São Caetano players Category:Expatriate footballers in China Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Portugal Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in South Korea Category:Expatriate footballers in South Korea Category:Expatriate footballers in Japan Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in China Category:Chinese Super League players Category:China League One players Category:J2 League players Category:K League 1 players Category:2014 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Curitiba Category:Association football defenders Category:Santa Helena Esporte Clube players
title: Alex Chandre de Oliveira
